H0.text: The sun is the most important source of electromagnetic radiation on Earth.

H1.text: The moon is the most important source of electromagnetic radiation on earth.

H2.text: Volcanos are the most important source of electromagnetic radiation on Earth.

H3.text: The oceans are the most important source of electromagnetic radiation on Earth.

A4.text: It is the main source of energy for life on Earth.

A5.text: radiating the energy from its surface mainly as visible light and infrared radiation with 10% at ultraviolet energies.
